animeDescription: It starts with a kid named Dai remembering a story told to him by his grandfather, the monster magician Brass, about the defeat of the Demon Lord Hadlar by the hands of a hero who, as the story progresses, is known to be Avan.
animeRelated: ['Alternative version: Dragon Quest: Dai no Daibouken (TV)', 'Sequel: Dragon Quest: Dai no Daibouken Tachiagare!! Aban no Shito']
